meta.note: Individual responses to each form field within a form submission
Text to include on the button

options.placeholder: For small businesses and indie hackers

meta.note: Unique field identifier, not shown to users (lowercase, hyphenated)
Text label shown to form users
Default text shown in empty input
Additional instructions shown below the input
Options for radio or select inputs
Unique ID for this specific form submission

options.placeholder: Thanks for reaching out! We'll be in touch soon.

meta.note: Show or hide this form from the site.
Setup email notifications when forms are submitted.
Add an email address and press enter. To use a form field as the email address use merge tags `{# #}` (e.g. `{# email #}.
Email subject line. You can use merge tags like this `Hi {# first-name #}`.
Include a message for the email body. To merge form responses use merge tags with the field name like `{# first-name #}`.
Small icon for browser tabs. 1:1 ratio. No larger than 512px × 512px.
Main logo shown on the site
Unique identifier for this menu. Can't be edited after creation.
What is the name of this menu? Only used internally.
Show or hide this menu from the site.
The internal page to link to
Label shown to the user for the menu item
What type of link is this? Page and Post allow you to link to internal content. URL is for external content. Group can contain other menu items.
Add child menu items within the group.
The internal post to link to
Temporarily hide this block on the website without having to remove it from your page.
Page title (visible to visitors and used in SEO)
Unique URL for this page (start with `/`, can have multiple segments `/about/me`))
meta.validation_message: Please use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens in your permalink, starting with a slash (/) and without a trailing slash

meta.note: Create and arrange different content blocks (like text, images, or videos) to build your page.
Short summary of what's on the page. Also used for SEO meta description.
